channel.title: Theiving on pk planet base! D: *RESOLVED* :D
channel.description: Well, when i (or anyone else who tries) levels up on any theiving stall it just lags them out completly, it doesnt dc them just freezes their screen. It doesnt give any error message on the server cmd. Im am totally lost. I've been messing with this for about a month now, but im not much of a coder so im not sure what to do. Any ideas? Thanks in advance!

changeText126("@dre@Congratulations! You've just advanced a Thieving level!", 4263); changeText126((new StringBuilder()).append("You have now reached level ").append(getLevelForXP(playerXP[i])). append("!").toString(), 4264); sendFrame164(4261);
